document_data.name: ''Radiant Holding''
document_data.mainbody: '''Radiant holding''' was a [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be applied to ranged weapon [[:Category:ammunition|ammunition]], such as [[arrow]]s, [[bolt]]s, or [[bullet]]s. When the ammunition struck the target, it immobilized them like the ''[[hold monster]]'' spell.
document_data.Crafting: The spells ''[[magic missile]]'' and ''hold monster'' were used when imbuing ammunition with this quality.
document_data.History: This quality was used in the [[Old Empires]] by [[wizard|wizards']] guards.
